name: Dungeon Penetrator 2018 (Pico-8)
description:
Dungeon Penetrator 2018. Made using Pico-8 for the 7DRL (Seven Day Rogue-Like) Challenge 2018.

This is a remake of a game I've failed to make in two previous 7drl challenges.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Z to pick up stuff
  • Enter / Select to pause

Made in less than 12 hours in total. Still needs balancing and refactoring.
